DOC.brief_summary: Post marketing drug use investigation of Genotropin for GHD-ADULTS.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Use Investigation of Somatropin for GHD-ADULTS.
DOC.detailed_description: All the patients whom an investigator prescribes the first Somatropin should be registered consecutively until the number of subjects reaches target number.
DOC.criteria: The patients who were administered Somatropin to treat "Adult growth hormone deficiency (limited to severe type)". Patients not administered Somatropin.
